page.title: 17B'NESS/SOLWAY.HOMES & HEALTH
page.content: {HOMES.}Heating & Cooking are by Electricity/Solid Fuel/Oil/Calor Gas. One house has Solar panels. House owners have peat cutting rights on Bowness Common for domestic use, but since 1983 annual application has to be made to the Nature Conservancy Council. Geological surveys for oil in the Solway, & for geothermal sources are being carried out in 1985. {HEALTH.}DOCTORS visit on call from surgery with dispensary at Kirkbride (4miles).Surgeries are -Mon.9am & 6pm Tues-9am & 6pm. Weds-9am & 6pm. Thurs 9am.Fri-9am & 6pm.Sat-Emergency only. There are District nurse & Home help Services. HOSPITALS , CHIROPODISTS, SPECIALIST CLINICS, & DENTISTS, are at Carlisle(13miles) or Wigton (11miles). Car Service or ambulance available for those who cannot travel by bus. People live to an extreme old age here.
